185998396.review: I used to play the original Yuji Naka sonic games constantly as a kid, and this game has been a fantastic call back to those days. I love the use of past level designs, but then adds more in a meaningful way that doesn't just bank on "member berries" for enjoyment. Highly recommended, and a must-have if you are a fan of the original three games.

185982663.review:
[h1] Sonic Mania: Mais rápido, mais divertido e ainda mais incrível [/h1]
[h3] Historia do Jogo [/h3]

Algum tempo após os acontecimentos de [b]Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles[/b], uma súbita rutura dimensional ocorre na atmosfera da Terra, fazendo com que a assinatura única de uma onda de energia aparecesse na Angel Island. Enquanto Tails captura a estranha leitura de energia, Eggman também detecta a energia e vai atrás dela em busca de poder. Sonic e Tails e Knuckles então vão de encontro ao Dr. Eggman para o impedi-lo.[spoiler]O final do jogo conduz aos acontecimentos de Sonic Forces [/spoiler].

[h3] Jogabilidade [/h3]
Todas as personagens jogáveis têm o conjunto de movimentos padrão: Spin Jump, Spin Attack e Spin Dash. Cada personagem também possui movimentos únicos: o Sonic pode usar o Drop Dash, um novo movimento introduzido neste jogo, que permite ao jogador fazer instantaneamente um Spin Dash ao aterrar de um salto, O Tails pode voar e nadar e o Knuckles pode planar e trepar paredes. Também é possível jogar com dois personagens e ao recolher as sete Esmeraldas e completar a última Zona com o Sonic, o jogador obtém o final bom do jogo.

[h3] A DLC Encore Mode [/h3]
Encore Mode é um modo de jogo exclusivo do Sonic Mania Plus que acontece após os eventos do Mania Mode e a conclusão de [b]Sonic Forces[/b]. O Encore mode inclui todas as fases do Mania Mode (exceto Egg Reverie Zone) e adiciona também os personagens: Mighty the Armadillo e Ray the Flying Squirrel. o Mighty possui o movimento Hammer Drop que o faz explodir para baixo em uma explosão de velocidade, batendo em Badniks e obstáculos e fazendo itens escondidos caírem das árvores e o Air Glide de Ray, que o permite planar grandes distâncias no ar e até ganhar altitude.

[h3] Ponto que eu não gostei muito durante a gameplay [/h3]
Sei que o isso vem desdes dos primeiros jogos do ouriço, mas o fato de perder a vida num boss act 2 e ter que voltar toda o act 1 do inicio é realmente frustrante.

[h3] Minha Experiencia com o Jogo [/h3]
Bom, esse jogo na realidade foi comprado para meu irmão jogar.. não para mim em si, mas ao passar do tempo e principalmente após o terceiro filme o Sonic nos cinemas, senti que deveria realmente jogar e finalizar o jogo. O jogo é incrivelmente bem feito, possui muitos detalhes que podem passar rapidamente. Joguei apenas de Sonic pois queria sentir como seria jogar apenas com um único personagem, admito que em certos momentos foi um pouco complicado. Não consegui todas as esmeraldas infelizmente, mas pretendo pegar elas posteriormente em uma segunda jogatina. As fases são bem divertidinhas de se fazer,(a minha favorita foi a Press Garden). Possivelmente irei retirar a DLC do encore mode quando aparecer alguma promoção, até lá ficarei apenas com o jogo base. A vibe que o jogo passa de exploração, combinada com a ótima trilha sonora que é oferecida ao decorrer das fases, torna a experiencia divertida e contagiante até. É uma ótima recomendação para quem estar querendo entrar no mundo do ouriço azul. 

[h3] Nota: [/h3]
9.8/10.

185969266.review:
I really loved this game at first. It was very much like the original Sonic games, but also keeping it fresh. It was challenging but not fun or unfair. However the last zone is IMO one long cheap shot at the player. It changes gears from all previous zones of the game and just hits you with cheap shot after cheap shot and game mechanics that are inconsistent. I'm not sure why they changed the formula for the last zone but after many many attempts it was no longer fun and I was unable to finish the game. 

In addition the save feature is poorly thought out. It only saves after completion of each zone. It does not save after individual acts, nor save points. That is also no manual save. This makes if difficult to play for people who can only play a little her and a little there. 

If you are a casual gamer who enjoyed the old Sonic Games avoid this game.

185923659.review: Mania is, to me, the best sonic game ever made, up there with Sonic 3 & Knuckles. Mania effectively doubles down on what makes classic Sonic so good: smooth animations, simple but creative bosses, great level design, insanely good music, & awesome pixel art. Stages are even different depending on what character is selected for replayability. Only criticisms I have are too many blue sphere stages (these are entirely optional) and I would’ve liked more purely original stages than reused stages from the past as the majority of the stages are enhanced, classic levels. Highly recommend. 9.0/10.

185755818.review:
it's a good celebration of the old sonic games with amazing visuals, ost, animations and feel. but it's not this groundbreaking, genre defining masterpiece that many call it (i had extremely high expectations for better or worse, they were met mostly but it is a bit overhyped) all of the classic sonic bs is still present, like dying to a platform because you are 1 pixel too far away from the object hitbox and die and have to start over, stuff like that, so if you dont enjoy that kind of thing i dont think this game will win you over, otherwise it is a very very fun good game, but that's it
also, i feel like near the half way point of the game there is wayy too much going on, like seriously i couldn't catch my breath. i felt genuine sensory overload at times, you go from "oh yea remember this tetris bean machine whatever game we made here u go" to "ok so remember that cool rival robot guy from cd yea hes back oh and also here's that other robot guy from the crappy game gear game" don't get me wrong it was fkin awesome but all of it genuinely felt like a blur (maybe that was the point) anywho i recommend it if you like classic sonic gameplay. oh yeah and fk the chaos emerald minigame

185601481.review: The biggest flaw with this game is that it wasn't made up of fully original levels and didn't have as much of a compelling narrative to contextualize its levels as Sonic 3 & Knuckles. In addition, it doesn't innovate upon or evolve the mechanics or moveset of 2D Sonic to the degree that games like the Sonic Advance series did (besides the drop dash, which is a great addition to the Sonic franchise). That said, this is easily one of the most polished and well-made Sonic games ever made, and a must-play for anyone who enjoys the classic Sonic games.

185289922.review:
[h1]🌀 Sonic Mania : Une Bouffée de Nostalgie Supersonique 🦔[/h1]
[p]Temps de jeu : Environ 6 à 8 heures pour une première run, mais bien plus si vous visez toutes les émeraudes du chaos et explorez chaque recoin des niveaux.[/p]
[p]Genre : Jeu de plateforme rapide à l'ancienne, mélange parfait entre hommage rétro et innovations modernes.[/p]

[h2]Les points positifs :[/h2]
[p]🚀 Le gameplay classique à son apogée : Sonic Mania reprend les bases des titres de la Mega Drive avec une précision exquise. Le contrôle est fluide, et chaque niveau regorge de routes alternatives.[/p]
[p]🎨 Des graphismes pixel-art somptueux : Les environnements vibrants et animés respectent l'esthétique rétro tout en y ajoutant une touche moderne. Green Hill Zone n’a jamais été aussi belle ![/p]
[p]🎵 Une bande-son magistrale : Tee Lopes livre des remix et de nouvelles compositions mémorables. Chaque morceau donne envie d’accélérer encore plus vite.[/p]
[p]🌀 Un mix parfait entre nostalgie et nouveauté : Des niveaux classiques revisités, comme Chemical Plant Zone, se mêlent à des créations originales brillantes comme Studiopolis Zone.[/p]
[p]🤝 Un mode coop et compétitif : Jouez avec un ami dans des courses effrénées ou aidez-vous mutuellement à affronter le Dr. Robotnik.[/p]

[h2]Les points négatifs :[/h2]
[p]⏳ Un contenu limité pour les joueurs occasionnels : Une fois le jeu terminé, certains pourraient regretter le manque de contenu narratif ou de nouveaux niveaux pour prolonger l’expérience.[/p]
[p]🤔 Difficulté old-school : Certains boss ou sections requièrent une précision impitoyable. Les nouveaux venus pourraient trouver cela frustrant.[/p]

[h2]Le prix :[/h2]
[p]Proposé à environ 20 €, Sonic Mania offre un excellent rapport qualité-prix, surtout pour les fans de la licence. Une véritable lettre d’amour à l’ère 16-bits ![/p]

[h2]🏆 Le platine :[/h2]
[p]Obtenir le "platine"  est un défi exigeant. Entre collecter toutes les émeraudes du chaos, compléter chaque mode et maîtriser les Blue Spheres, comptez une vingtaine d’heures, avec quelques cheveux arrachés en bonus. 🌀[/p]

[p]En résumé, Sonic Mania est tout ce que les fans de la saga pouvaient espérer : rapide, fun et bourré de charme. Que vous soyez un vétéran nostalgique ou un nouveau venu curieux, ce jeu vous invite à courir à pleine vitesse dans un tourbillon de plaisir rétro. Alors, attrapez vos anneaux et partez sauver le monde avec style ! 🦔✨[/p]

185202352.review: I've wanted to complete this game for years because I've only heard positive things about it. I think I'm giving up on it again on a new play through. Traps feel really cheap because they all jump out at you. The only way I can enjoy this game is if I keep playing and memorizing every aspect of the levels, which isn't terribly fun for me. I want to like this game but I can't. I don't recommend it.

184817829.review: Отличная игра про Соника, которая показывает на что способны фанаты на самом деле. Давно всем знакомый геймплей не даст заскучать, ведь у нашего любимого ёжика появилась новая способность-Drop Dash. 8 старых и 4 новых зоны позволят погрузится в детство и с комфортом провести время. Что насчёт encore режима? Ну это отличная идея провести игрока по зонам ещё раз с новой механикой и палитрами. 2 новых (старых) героя (Майти и Рей) добавляют реиграбельность. Присутствует локальный мультиплеер с поддержкой Steam Remote Play Together. Однозначно рекомендую! Как фанат Соника особенно.

184701290.review:
По скидке взять самое то. За полный ценник... Ну, ожиданий может не оправдать, признаюсь честно. 
Мне нравится, как сделана эта игра. Даже задолбавший всех Green Hill смотрится здесь свежо. Это, все же, самый первый уровень во франшизе, самый легендарный, визитная карточка Соника, он обязан был появиться в игре, которая максимально обновляет классику с приправкой чего-то нового. Сюжет нормальный, он есть, связывает локации и куда-то побуждает стремиться - а большего от подобных игр и не надо. Геймплейно все как раньше, но получше. Анимации плавные, персонажей достаточно (если мы рассматриваем Encore версию, то еще лучше), у них есть свои особенности, вдобавок к скорости. Реиграбельность есть, пусть и не сильная. Есть смысл изучать уровни, их интересно пробегать по несколько раз. В общем, это отличный наследник классики, но не больше. 

Если хотите чего-то нового от Соника - эта игра не для вас. Но если вам нравится классика и ее вам не хватило - берите, не пожалеете.

184327879.review:
EL juego es muy malo. Tengo que decir que no había jugado ningún sonic retro hasta ahora, pero es que es muy malo. Tiene muchos fallos para ser un juego de tanto renombre. Me parece bien que se haga para recordar los tiempos antiguos de sonic, pero los juegos hoy en día han mejorado, y no hay razón de no usar diseños plataformeros actuales para una mejor experiencia.
El juego no tiene "coyote time", no tiene "input buffer", entre otras muchas. Es muy incomodo de jugar, a veces me siento con mucha velocidad y otras con poca. Muchas veces que vas a toda velocidad te acabas haciendo daño contra un enemigo contra el que no da tiempo a reaccionar. 
Hay muchas cosas que no tienen sentido en este juego. Acabar un segundo acto con uno de vida no te las rellena, paso al siguiente nivel, y si muero una sola vez al final del segundo acto vuelvo a empezar, cuando en ese nivel no había cometido ni un solo error. Es mucho mas rentable gastar todas tus vidas cada vez que empiezas un nuevo nivel en acto 1. 
Simplemente me parece que se ha pecado demasiado en pequeñas decisiones de diseño que hacen este juego frustrante, solo por conseguir la mayor sensación retro posible, sin pensar en la jugabilidad, lo cual no tiene ni un poco de sentido en el estado actual del mercado de plataformas. Hay mil mejores donde elegir con estéticas  y jugabilidades retro.

184147777.review: Sonic Mania (ソニックマニア Sonikku Mania?) é um jogo eletrónico de plataforma desenvolvido pelo Christian Whitehead, PagodaWest Games e Headcannon e publicado pela Sega. Produzido em comemoração ao 25º aniversário da série Sonic the Hedgehog. O jogo retorna para a jogabilidade 2D e o estilo visual original dos jogos Mega Drive. Foi lançado para Microsoft Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 e Xbox One em 15 de Agosto de 2017. Sonic percorre por mais de 12 níveis, incluindo várias fases redesenhadas de jogos anteriores. O jogador controla Sonic the Hedgehog e os seus companheiros Tails e Knuckles the Echidna na sua aventura para derrotar o arque-inimigo Doutor Eggman e seus robôs caóticos.

183800501.review:
[h1] Irónicamente, lo mejor de Sonic en los últimos años [/h1]

Sonic es, en esencia, esa saga que dejó de brillar en entregas pasadas y año tras año busca volver a ser lo que era antes. Bien, irónicamente un estudio hecho por fans tuvieron un mejor trabajo y cariño que el propio Sonic Team.

En resumen, Sonic Mania nace a raíz de un juego hecho por fans pero con la aprobación suficiente para ser lanzado de forma oficial. En un marco del 25º aniversario del personaje, en 2017 vale aclarar, se lanza un juego que busca rememorar los niveles clásicos del erizo azul, combinados con diferentes niveles y reinterpretaciones hechas por los fans.

Lo que tenemos en Sonic Mania es un juego que busca asemejarse a los clásicos. Eso sí, en el momento que empiezas a adentrarte en niveles más modernos, se nota la diferencia a la hora de abordar los niveles del erizo. 

El único gran defecto se relaciona con esto. No solo que ciertos sprites se sienten fuera de lugar o de época, sino que también, ciertos niveles son MUY injustos; te obligan a cortar con el ritmo que venías y llegan a incluir diseños muy confusos.

Por el resto, es un buen juego que se disfruta mucho.

183795772.review: Beautiful game. It is a bit challenging, but still fun.

183794857.review: The best standalone 2D Sonic game ever made, and probably the best Sonic game of all time. It's basically a greatest hits of all the Genesis games combined into 1 game with a few new zones and levels. The level design has been tweaked so that there are no cheap deaths, and having multiple characters gives the game a lot of replay value. Sonic Origins may have more content with all the original games, but for the price, it's a really fun time. Highly recommended.

183540014.review:
I always hated sonic.  I grew up a nintendo kid and always thought sonic was inferior in every way.  The few bits and levels I had played at friends' houses didn't do anything for me and I figured he was just the second rate Sega knockoff of a real platformer style game.
Well, I got Sonic Mania in a bundle and decided I'd give it a fair shot rather than judging it by my prejudices and a few random minutes of gameplay here and there from years ago.  Well, I played it all the way through to an ending (not the best ending), and I've got to say... I was right.  I still hate sonic.  I find the level design annoying, never knowing where I'm going or supposed to go, the imprecise clunky feeling of his movement or changing direction.  The way you can't get the stupid blue sawblade to gather speed because if you're moving .1 pixel per hour he instead goes into buzzsaw mode at .1 pixel per hour (I remember hating this as a kid).  The bosses are all dumbfoundingly easy or really frustrating.  It's just a second rate platformer series of games as I always assumed.
So why the positive recommendation then?  Well, while I hate it, I recognize that this is a good SONIC game, even if I don't think it's a good game.  If you like sonic, or if you just have different tastes than I do, you probably think this game is just great.  It's true to the classic gameplay and themes, and if you like that stuff, then I'd recommend this installment to you.

183535040.review:
9 - 10 (Incrivel)

O jogo é melhor do que eu lembrava, arrisco a dizer que é melhor que o sonic 3 que é um dos meus sonics favoritos. O jogo tem pixel arte lindas, músicas fodas, e não é irritante que nem os sonic classicos, na questão de ter um monte de obstaculo chato no caminho(ainda tem mas bem menos).

As únicas falhas do jogo é que em alguns levels ele é bem lento e foca mais em plataforma ao invés de velocidade. Fora alguns picks de zona bem duvidosos, como. Qm porras tava pedindo [spoiler]Oil ocean ou a zona da caverna KKKK[spoiler].
